task.title: Getting started
task.shortdesc: Prepare the demonstration HTML file for making a simple presentation.

context.p: Perform this task before making any slides.

step.cmd: Find the demonstration index file in the Reveal.js root directory.
Open this file in your text editor and save it as "index_template" so that you will have a copy of the demonstration HTML file without any of your changes. Make your changes in the index file.
Find the Reveal CSS file in the css folder located in the root directory. Again, make a copy such that you have an unmodified version.
Comment out the "Created by" section. Do not delete it - keeping it in gives credit to the creator of Reveal.js.

Delete the content in all the sections except "Marvelous Lists". You will need this content for making your bulleted list slide. As the last step in preparing a presentation you can delete section elements so the presentation doesn't have blank slides.
